contentrichtext.text: {{Unreferenced|date=December 2009}} [[File:Iwase District in Fukushima Prefecture.svg|thumb|Location of Iwase District in [[Fukushima Prefecture]]]] {{Nihongo|'''Iwase'''|岩瀬郡|Iwase-gun}} is a [[districts of Japan|district]] located in [[Fukushima Prefecture|Fukushima]], [[Japan]]. As of 2003, the district has an estimated [[population]] of 31,847 and a [[population density|density]] of 83.50 persons per km². The total area is 381.38 km². ==Towns and villages== *[[Kagamiishi, Fukushima|Kagamiishi]] *[[Tenei, Fukushima|Ten'ei]] ==Merger== * On April 1, 2005 the town of [[Naganuma, Fukushima|Naganuma]] and the village of [[Iwase, Fukushima|Iwase]] merged into the city of [[Sukagawa, Fukushima|Sukagawa]]. {{Fukushima}} {{coord|37|17|17|N|140|04|30|E|type:landmark_source:itwiki|display=title}} [[Category:Districts in Fukushima Prefecture]] [[Category:Iwashiro Province|District Iwase]] {{Fukushima-geo-stub}}
